answers.answer: Without a medical reason (like gestational diabetes or extreme hypertension, not like "it hurts and I don't feel like it anymore") no respectable doctor will induce before 39 weeks.
I want to be induced too! Good luck mama ;) and I heard they can induce as early as 38 weeks if baby is healthy.

question: So my first son will turn 2 on July 3rd and I am due July 18th with second baby boy. I want to ask my doctor next week about getting induced around that day so they can have same birthday lol I'll be almost 38w then.. I'm just so anxious. And plus I've been feeling very uncomfortable this past couple weeks like its so hard to get out of bed without feeling pressure and even when walking, with my first I felt no pain at all whatsoever and I was 5 days late.. My water broke on its own but was given pitocin to start contractions. I feel like this baby will come early even if I ask to get induced or not lol. By the way I'm 31w3d (:
title: How do you feel about being induced?
